org.numenta.nupic.util

Class LowMemorySparseBinaryMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.util.FlatMatrixSupport<T>
      • org.numenta.nupic.util.SparseMatrixSupport
        • org.numenta.nupic.util.SparseBinaryMatrixSupport
          • org.numenta.nupic.util.LowMemorySparseBinaryMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FlatMatrix, Matrix, SparseMatrix

    public class LowMemorySparseBinaryMatrix
extends SparseBinaryMatrixSupport
    Low Memory implementation of SparseBinaryMatrix without a backing array.
    Author:
    Jose Luis Martin

        public java.lang.Object getSlice(int... coordinates)
        Description copied from class: SparseBinaryMatrixSupport
        Returns the slice specified by the passed in coordinates. The array is returned as an object, therefore it is the caller's responsibility to cast the array to the appropriate dimensions.
        Specified by:
        getSlice in class SparseBinaryMatrixSupport
        Parameters:
